topic.title: Adding Libraries to the Built-in FO Processor (XML with XSLT and FO)

body.section:
Adding Hyphenation Support for XML with XSLT Transformation ScenariosYou can extend the functionality of the built-in FO processor by dropping additional libraries in the [OXYGEN_DIR]/lib/fop directory. To add support for hyphenation:
Download the pre-compiled JAR from OFFO .
Copy the fop-hyph.jar file into the [OXYGEN_DIR]/lib/fop folder.
Restart .

ol.li: Copy the libraries into the [OXYGEN_DIR]/lib folder.
